ns0:DescribedValueSet.ns0:Purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values represents the concept of severe),(Data Element Scope: This value set is meant to be used with QDM Attribute severity to be used with the QDM Datatype Diagnosis to indicate the level of severity),(Inclusion Criteria: This value set includes SNOMED CT codes representing the qualifier severe),(Exclusion Criteria: This value set excludes all SNOMED CT qualifiers that are not severe)
